{"id":1039930805,"question_id":2915,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"9 months, 1 week","timestamp":1693797968,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"29 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1039930805/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Count of Interesting Subarrays","memory":"62.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public long countInterestingSubarrays(List<Integer> nums, int modulo, int k) {\n        HashMap<Integer, Integer> map = new HashMap<>();\n        long res = 0;\n        int cnt = 0;\n        map.put(0, 1);\n\n        for (int n : nums) {\n            if (n % modulo == k) {\n                cnt++;\n            }\n            res += map.getOrDefault((cnt - k + modulo) % modulo, 0);\n            map.put(cnt % modulo, map.getOrDefault(cnt % modulo, 0) + 1);\n        }\n\n        return res;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"count-of-interesting-subarrays","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
